Name: Aayla Fetzer
Bio: I'm a nonbinary Python and Rust developer exploring cryptography and computer vision with OpenCV.

Content.Title: Lead Script & Web Developer
Content.Subtitle: Socialist Rifle Association
Roles: Maintain and develop the [socialistra.org](https://socialistra.org) website and any other SRA websites, web services, and server infrastructure
Consulting with and advising any web or script development contractors hired by the SRA
Create scripts to assist in day-to-day functions of SRA staff
Create tools to manage member data and mass emails through Mailgun

Content.Title: Contract Engineer
Content.Subtitle: Socialist Rifle Association
Roles: Install and configure [Tendenci](https://www.tendenci.com/) for membership management
Create a [translation layer](https://gitlab.com/afetzer/joinit-discourse-integration) with Python Django between JoinIt and Discourse to automatically add new members to a forum

Content.Title: Data Analytics
Content.Subtitle: Arete Associates
Roles: Developing and implementing a phase correlation algorithm in Python and C++ to detect and track subpixel objects in real time
Develop a binary file format to hold camera frames compressed with the Lempel-Ziv-Markov Chain and PAQ8L Algorithms
Develop a Python script to automatically extract and organize data from proprietary formats through a GUI

Content.Title: Metropolitan State University
